mapper.select:
select code, md_code, title, reward_name, reward_price, goal_price, stack_price, image, category, open_date, end_date, funding_state from funding
category = #{category}
and title like '%' || upper(#{val}) || '%'
and funding_state = '501'
order by end_date
order by open_date desc

select distinct f.code as code, md_code, title, reward_name, goal_price, stack_price, image, category, open_date, end_date, funding_state, count(*)over(PARTITION by funding_code) as cnt from funding f, likes l
l.funding_code(+) = f.code
and title like '%' || upper(#{val}) || '%'
and funding_state = '501'
order by cnt desc

select f.code as code, md_code, title, reward_name, reward_price, goal_price, stack_price, image, category, open_date, end_date, funding_state from funding f, member m
md_code = m.code
and m.name like '%' || #{val} || '%'
and category = #{category}
and funding_state = '501'
order by end_date
order by open_date desc

select distinct f.code as code, md_code, title, reward_name, reward_price, goal_price, stack_price, image, category, open_date, end_date, funding_state, count(*)over(PARTITION by funding_code) as cnt from funding f, likes l, member m
f.code = l.funding_code and f.md_code = m.code
and m.name like '%' || #{val} || '%'
and category = #{category}
and funding_state = '501'
order by cnt desc

select code, md_code, title, reward_name, reward_price, goal_price, stack_price, image, category, open_date, end_date, funding_state from ( select distinct f.code as code, md_code, title, reward_name, reward_price, goal_price, stack_price, image, category, open_date, end_date, funding_state, count(*)over(PARTITION by funding_code) as cnt from funding f, likes l where l.funding_code = f.code order by cnt desc) where rownum < 5

select code, md_code, title, reward_name, reward_price, goal_price, stack_price, image, category, open_date, end_date, funding_state from ( select code, md_code, title, reward_name, reward_price, goal_price, stack_price, image, category, open_date, end_date, funding_state from funding where funding_state = '501' order by end_date) where rownum < 5

select code, md_code, title, reward_name, reward_price, goal_price, stack_price, image, category, open_date, end_date, funding_state from ( select code, md_code, title, reward_name, reward_price, goal_price, stack_price, image, category, open_date, end_date, funding_state from funding where funding_state = '502' order by open_date) where rownum < 5
